title: Fusion of Deep Learning and Traditional Machine Learning
section_id: 3.4 Fusion of Deep Learning and Traditional Machine Learning
description: Discuss approaches that combine deep learning with traditional machine learning techniques.Analyze the benefits of integrating hand-crafted features with deep-learned features.

example.description: Combines functional brain networks and power spectral density (PSD) features with an Extreme Learning Machine (ELM) classifier.
Combines wavelet packet energy with a KPCA-SVM model, showcasing improved recognition accuracy over traditional methods.
Combines EEG, EDA, and video signals with machine learning algorithms, specifically the decision tree model, for enhanced fatigue classification.

all_upper_levels.title: The Role of Deep Learning and Hybrid Models
all_upper_levels.section_id: 3. The Role of Deep Learning and Hybrid Models
